page.title: 14THE CHURCHS OF MICHAEL,JOHN
page.content: {DODISCOMBSLEIGH CHURCH THIS CHURCH IS A BEAUTIFUL SMALL VALLEY TEIGN.THE CARVING OF THE LA ST SUPPER BEHIND THE ALTER IS IS THE MOST FAVOURITE THING OF THE GROUP TOUR.IT IS CARVED SO DETAILED AND IT LOOKS SO REALISTIC.THE FRONT IS CARVED BEAUTIFULLY.THE STONE IS CARVED SO WELL.THE FLOWER ARRANGEMENTS REALLY CHEER UP THE CHURCH.{ {ASHTON CHURCH THIS BEAUTIFUL CANDLELIGHT GRANITE CHURCH IN ASHTON IS A ANCIENT MEDIEVAL SCREEN AND ITS PEACEFUL FRESH BUT GENTEL BREEZE THROW THE CHURCH.
